About Trident Gymnastics

Excellence in gymnastics training for all ages

Our Mission

At Trident Gymnastics, we are committed to providing a safe, supportive, and challenging environment where gymnasts of all ages and skill levels can develop their physical abilities, build confidence, and achieve their personal best.

Our Values

  • Safety First: Every activity is designed with safety as the top priority
  • Inclusive Environment: We welcome gymnasts of all backgrounds and abilities
  • Personal Growth: We focus on individual progress and development
  • Fun Learning: We believe gymnastics should be enjoyable and engaging

Our Facility

Our state-of-the-art facility features:

  • Olympic-standard equipment
  • Climate-controlled environment
  • Spacious viewing areas
  • Modern changing facilities
  • On-site parking

Our Coaches

Our certified coaches bring years of experience and passion to every class. All coaches are:

  • Certified by national gymnastics organizations
  • First aid and CPR trained
  • Background checked and cleared
  • Committed to ongoing professional development

Our Story

Founded in 2010, Trident Gymnastics began as a small community gym with a big dream: to make gymnastics accessible to everyone. Over the years, we've grown from a handful of students to serving hundreds of families in our community.

Today, we're proud to offer comprehensive programs that cater to recreational gymnasts, competitive athletes, and everyone in between. Our success is measured not just in medals and trophies, but in the smiles, confidence, and friendships that develop within our walls.
